bibl.title: Two Ostraca from Syene / Elephantine.
bibl.note: Two ostraca transcribed by John Gavin Tait in the 1930s, then in private possession of Aylward Manley Blackman (1883-1956). - 1. O. Coll. privées: O. Blackman 1. Tax Receipt. c. 123. - 2. O. Coll. privées: O. Blackman 2. Receipt for μερισμοί. 28 October 171.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, Two Ostraca from Syene / Elephantine.

Two ostraca transcribed by John Gavin Tait in the 1930s, then in private possession of Aylward Manley Blackman (1883-1956). - 1. O. Coll. privées: O. Blackman 1. Tax Receipt. c. 123. - 2. O. Coll. privées: O. Blackman 2. Receipt for μερισμοί. 28 October 171.
